name: Block Fish - Fun Puzzle Game
description:
Block Fish is a fun block game. Block Fish is very simple and addictive.

The new combo mode will bring you a lot of new fun.

You will love this puzzle games when blocks particles splash on the screen.

BLOCK FISH FEATURES
. Beautiful blocks and scene
. Four addictive game modes.
. Interesting sounds and music
. Easy to play, hard to master
. It is easy to learn
. It is offline game, so don not need wifi.

HOW TO PLAY BLOCK FISH
. Drag the blocks to fill the grid with one column or one row
. When you create full line on the grid, you will get scores.
. The Blocks can not be rotated
. Game will be over if there are no space for any of the pending shapes.

Please Enjoy this Block Fish game and you will love this game!
